title: Enhancing AI Competencies: Protecting Student Privacy in Higher Education: Ethical Design Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more evaluation criteria for identifying privacy risks when integrating technology online.
Learners can design privacy-protected learning activities by applying an ethical design framework.
Learners can complete a scenario that ethically reviews the process of collecting and storing student data in VR-based simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
